title: Login not working
description: User cannot log in with correct credentials. After submitting the username and password, the page refreshes without error, but the user is redirected back to the login screen. No error message is displayed on the UI. This has been reported by three different users today.

title: Page loading slowly
description: The main dashboard page, which shows the ticket list, takes consistently over 15 seconds to load. The console shows a long wait on the `/api/tickets/open` endpoint. This is impacting all agents' productivity.

title: Error 500 on payment
description: The third-party payment API endpoint `/api/payment/process` returns an HTTP 500 status code approximately 20% of the time during peak hours (10 AM - 2 PM UTC). The error logs indicate a timeout in the database connection on our end, but the root cause is unclear.

title: Forgot password email not received
description: Users who click the 'Forgot Password' link successfully see the confirmation message, but the reset email never arrives. We have checked the email logs and there's no record of the email being sent. This is preventing users from accessing their accounts.

title: Profile picture upload fails
description: When attempting to upload a new profile picture (JPG or PNG, less than 2MB), the progress bar stops at 99%, and eventually an 'Upload Failed: Server Error' message is displayed. The backend logs show an issue with image resizing/storage.

title: Notification emails not sent
description: The system is currently failing to send any automated notification emails, specifically for new ticket assignments or status changes. The mail queue is backing up, and we are not seeing any outgoing SMTP connection attempts in the logs.

title: Unable to reset 2FA
description: Users who are locked out of their accounts due to a lost two-factor authentication device are unable to use the 'Reset 2FA' form. Submitting the form results in a 'User Not Authorized' error, and manual intervention is required.

title: Search returns no results
description: The global search bar consistently returns an empty list, even when searching for ticket IDs or exact titles known to exist. This affects both the main search page and the dashboard quick search. This seems to be a recent regression.

title: Cannot download invoice
description: When a user clicks the 'Download PDF' button for any invoice, the request to `/api/invoice/download/1234` immediately fails with a network error. The console shows a broken connection, and no file is ever downloaded. The issue is persistent across all browsers.

title: Page crashes on mobile
description: The mobile version of the dashboard, when viewed on small screen sizes (below 600px), crashes the browser tab after 5-10 seconds of loading. This is happening on both iOS and Android devices, suggesting a memory leak or a complex rendering issue.
